entries.text: Acknowledge the origins of achievements to prevent complacency.

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: Engage with challenges and opposition to foster growth.

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: Value critics and skeptics as catalysts for improvement.

entries.text: Self-pity can stimulate deeper reflection and understanding.
